title: Country park in Hong Kong Island
name: Country park in Hong Kong Island
description: Introduction to Map Mashups Final Project - Country Park in Hong Kong Island (Layer 4) By River Lo

properties.ecological hightlights: Hong Kong Gordonia (Gordonia axillaris), Machilus species, Ivy Tree (Schefflera heptaphylla), Aporusa (Aporusa dioica) and Rose Myrtle (Rhodomyrtus tomentosa). Rare plants like Buddhist Pine (Podocarpus macrophyllus) and Blue Japanese Oak (Cyclobalanopsis glauca)?. Musk Shrew (Suncus murinus) and Chestnut Spiny Rat (Niviventer fulvescens). Chinese Porcupine (Hystrix brachyura), Chinese Leopard Cat (Felis bengalensis) and Common Muntjac (Munitacus muntjac).
properties.location: Links Pottinger Peak with Mount Collinson, and crosses Wan Cham Shan and Shek O Peak (Dragon's Back) to reach D'Aguilar Peak in the south.

properties.ecological hightlights: Taiwan Acacia (Acacia confusa), Slash Pine (Pinus elliottii), Hong Kong Gordonia (Gordonia axillaris), Rhododendrons, Common Melastoma (Melastoma candidum), White Popinac (Leucaena leucocephala), Miniature Umbrella Plant (Schefflera arboricola), Machilus species, Hong Kong Camellia (Cemellia hongkongensis) and several orchids.
properties.location: From Jardine's Lookout in the north, it sprawls across rolling slopes of The Twins to end at the southern border on Stanley Gap Road. The western border lies in Wong Nai Chung Gap, while Tai Tam Road marks its eastern boundary.
